headline.main: Abroad; The Birth Pangs of the Grand Alliance

lead_paragraph: International policy and international cooperation are in process of development. At this moment, when nations are struggling for survival and new ideas are in conflict with the old, they are at a painful and critical stage of that process. This is the real meaning of the troubled debate going on both within and between the states of the anti-Axis coalition.
